name: GA-PVcounter
author: enomoto@celtislab

sections.description:
It is a widget that uses the data of google analytics, to view the page views chart and rankings of popular posts and recent posts.

  • The display in the tab switching the popular posts and page views (Today / 7days / 30days / 1year) by period.
  • Device-specific(desktop / mobile / tablet)　page view count chart display.
  • The display of only the page view count chart. (Popular posts is not needed)
  • View Popular posts via short code to an article in.
  • Recent post and small pv chart (30days)
  • View image within an article or thumbnail

Other parameters : Minimum query interval (minutes), Short code for use in Text Widget, …

日本語の説明
sections.installation:
1. Upload the GA-PVcounter folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open the settings menu and the authentication to access the analytical data
  4. When authenticating Follow the instructions on the screen. Then, set the profile ID and options
  5. A new widget called GA-PVcounter and GA-PV Recent posts of the widget page is added
  6. Drag and drop the sidebar GA-PVcounter, GA-PV Recent posts widget, set the parameters
  7. Use the short code [GA_PVC type="today" count="10" image="true"] popular posts to display the page. (type = today/7day/30day/year, count = 1 – 100, image = true/false)
